707334f-b.text:
Waverly Avenue, north from near Fulton Street, across Gates Avenue.
View 2 shows the houses Nos. 467-457 extending to Gates Avenue.
View 3 is north from Gates Avenue. All buildings are on the east side of the avenue.
P. L. Sperr    September 16, 1941
Views 1-3
707334f-b.folder: Waverly Ave. & Fulton St., Brooklyn, NY
